name: Tiny Boats
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam, in this small game you drive a RC-boat from your bath. Your goal is to destroy every other ship and be the last standing.

Use the arrow keys from your keyboard to move the boat, target for the other boats engine, but be carefull at your own engine.

In the week, I had almost no time to code so this game is made in about 4 hours, which mean no music, no souds, no nice graphics, no good IA,... But I hope you'll enjoy it a little bit at least!

This is my first contribution on itch.io, so if there is any problem, of format or anything, please tell me so I can correct it for next time.
